headline: Dow (NYSE:DOW) Unveils Diamond Infrastructure Solutions Expanding Services Across US Gulf Coast
summary: Last week, Diamond Infrastructure Solutions entered the market as a fully resourced service provider, supported by Dow (NYSE:DOW) and Macquarie Asset Management. Against broader market trends, where the Dow Jones added 1.5% spurred by positive jobs data and potential U.S.-China trade talks, Dow's price movement of 2.6% was slightly higher. This gain aligns with overall market optimism, supplemented by solid earnings results. Although the infrastructure partnership announcement bolstered Dow's...
